title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
**Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart**

Take your gardening and outdoor projects to the next level with the durable and versatile Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart. Designed for the serious gardener and outdoor enthusiast, this cart combines strength, flexibility, and ease of use to make your work easier and more efficient.

**Key Features:**

- **Robust Steel Frame:** Built with a solid steel frame and a steel mesh bed, this cart is designed to withstand heavy-duty use in your garden, yard, or any outdoor space.
- **Quick and Easy Assembly:** Get straight to work with a cart that's easy to put together, allowing you to spend more time on your projects and less on setup.
- **Convertible Design:** With removable side panels, this cart easily converts to a flatbed cart, providing versatility for carrying larger items.
- **Smooth Maneuverability:** The cart features a tight turn radius and 10-inch pneumatic tires, ensuring it moves smoothly over various terrains with ample ground clearance.
- **High Capacity:** Capable of carrying up to 400 lb or 3 cu ft, this cart can handle everything from garden supplies to tools without breaking a sweat.
- **Convenient Dimensions:** The bed measures 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width, providing a spacious area for your hauling needs.
- **Ergonomic Handling:** A straight pull handle is designed for comfort and ease of movement, making it simple to pull the cart wherever you need it.
- **Built to Last:** Comes with a 1-year limited warranty, ensuring your investment is protected.
- **Compact and Portable:** The cart stands at an overall height of 37 inches and weighs just 36.6 pounds, making it easy to store and maneuver.
- **Attractive Design:** Finished in a vibrant green color, this cart is not only functional but also adds a touch of style to your outdoor equipment.

Whether you're moving soil, transporting plants, or carrying tools, the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart is the reliable choice for all your outdoor tasks. Add it to your arsenal today and experience the difference it makes in your work!

**Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart**

Take your gardening to the next level with the **Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart**, the versatile and durable companion for any outdoor project. Whether you're hauling dirt, mulch, or garden supplies, this cart is designed to make the job easier and more efficient.

**Key Features:**

- **Durable Construction**: Built with a robust steel mesh frame that can handle up to 400 lbs of weight, this cart is designed to last.
- **Versatile Design**: Convertible to a flatbed cart, the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM is perfect for moving larger items. Removable side panels allow for flexibility in loading and unloading materials.
- **Easy to Maneuver**: With a tight turn radius and 10-inch pneumatic tires, navigating through narrow paths or over rough terrain is a breeze.
- **Ample Ground Clearance**: The thoughtful design ensures ample ground clearance, so you can move your cart without worrying about uneven ground or obstacles.
- **Comfortable Handling**: Featuring a straight pull handle, this cart provides an ergonomic grip for comfortable hauling.
- **Quick Assembly**: Spend less time on setup and more time on your project with the quick assembly feature of this cart.
- **Generous Dimensions**: The bed dimensions of 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width offer a spacious area for garden supplies or tools.
- **1-Year Limited Warranty**: Your purchase is protected by a 1-year limited warranty, ensuring peace of mind with your investment.
- **Stable and Secure**: A 4-wheel design keeps the cart stable on all types of terrain.
- **Easy to Store**: At an overall height of 37 inches and weighing just 36.6 pounds, the cart is easy to store in your shed or garage.
- **Vibrant Color**: The cart comes in an attractive green color that looks great in any garden setting.

Whether you're a professional landscaper or a home gardening enthusiast, the **Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart** is the perfect tool to simplify your workload and enhance your gardening experience. Add it to your arsenal today and revolutionize the way you work in the garden!
